reviews.text: All the boxes are ticked, apart from the reception staff. I got the impression that everything was just too much trouble. On the second night of our stay we arrived back late, to find that the room key did not work. Went back to reception card was reactivated, no apology. This was the case with three out of four rooms. A simple sorry would have gone a long way.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: This hotel is fabulous. It is at walking distance from the Lyon airport. The rooms are spacious and modern. I had a great night's sleep before catching a flight the next morning. It was great value for the rate - it was almost the same price as the hotel I was initially staying at (Campanile Lyon Est – Aéroport Saint-Exupéry) and that I did not like at all.
reviews.title: Great hotel right at the Lyon airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would certainly recommend this hotel if you are looking to stay close to the airport.
reviews.title: Great hotel right in the airport

reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and modern. The restaurant is quite good, too. It does take a while to get into the city of Lyon from the hotel, so it's not a great choice for touring. The only real problem is getting to the hotel by car - you can see it but can't figure out how to get to it. If you arrive at the airport, you can walk across the street from Terminal 1.
reviews.title: Clean, convenient and quiet -- what you need from an airport hotel

reviews.text: My spouse, son and I stayed here twice (6/24 & 7/10) as we were going through to other destinations. It is very convenient as you are directly across the terminals. It is very quiet even though you are right at the airport. It is very clean, with extra pillows if needed, basic toiletry products, in-room safe, TV, in-room coffee maker, comfortable beds (cot as extra bed for my son in larger room), fee-based internet in rooms, free internet in the common areas (although limited in time but renewable via log in credentials available at the front desk -- annoying but it works). Restaurant provides menu or buffet; food is OK but some desserts are not 'home made' even if they look good. Both hotel and restaurant are a little pricey but OK since you're probably not going to spend a week there! Bar has limited hours but has a good selection. Check in process was fine and quick both times with charming hostesses. Multilingual staff helps if you are not French. Would stay there again if needed to.
reviews.title: Good Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent one night here after a late arrival in Lyon. After a quick check in we found our room to be spacious and the bed was comfortable. The bathroom was quite large and very clean. We had the buffet breakfast at the hotel. It is quite expensive, but offers not only the convenience of being in the hotel, but a wide variety of choices. Hot dishes, cerals, bread, meat, cheese, etc. The food was very good and served in a nice setting. Overall, I would rate this hotel higher than most airport hotels. We would definitely stay here again if passing through Lyon.
reviews.title: Great one night stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night as we had a 6am flight from Lyon. Location is great as it's right next to the airport (could see the planes from my room). The hotel was really modern and the rooms were a great size. We eat in the restaurant - they did a buffet which was really nice food and decent value. We went for the cheaper starter, dessert option but there was plenty to chose from. We were leaving too early to try their breakfast. There was a power cut during the dinner but the staff handled it really well and service was of a high standard even during these unusual circumstances. Also used the steam room and sauna and these were quiet and clean. We also booked early and got the room for 65 Euros so excellent value.
reviews.title: Excellent Airport Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Flying in or out of Lyon is a breeze for early or late flights with this relatively new hotel, literally adjacent to Terminal 1 departures. It is about 50 meters from the hotel to the terminal entrance.
reviews.title: Quick Clean , Convenient

reviews.text: Hotel is modern, very clean, good food breakfast and dinner and very efficient. Also adjacent to the TGV garre. Never heard a single flight take off, very guiet.
reviews.title: Stay here - eat somewhere else

reviews.text: Ticks all the boxes for convenience, cleanliness and comfort - and so handy for the airport. Check-in professional and friendly, room clean, spacious and amazingly quiet, right next to the airport. Rates are pretty high but not ridiculous for the location and the amenity.
reviews.title: We would recommend this hotel to anyone

reviews.text: We loved this hotel! It's so convenient (we had to catch an early morning flight) and it was easy to return the rental car. Its location, plus comfortable room and lobby, and pleasant staff, gave us a stress-free travel night. We read and caught up with email via free lobby wifi (they will explain how to use it for free, for more than 30 minutes) --we'd been traveling for two weeks with varying degrees of "connectivity."
reviews.title: total relaxation..thank you, NH Lyon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Front desk reception staff both at evening check-in (three young women) and early next morning(a young man) were professional, courteous, helpful. Very nice to see what seemed sincere welcoming smiles after some of our travel experiences in France.
reviews.title: One of the best airport hotel experiences ever

reviews.text: We didnt eat at the hotel, as we had our own food. We used the comfy beds for a picnic. Room amazingly quiet, considering it's right across from airport.
reviews.title: Needs a new cleaning staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One reviewer mentioned the dark wood laminate floor. Well, that flooring shows every bit of dust and speck of dirt---and there was none!!!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Room decor/furnishings are Ikea modular type. One of the corridor doors has a porthole window-- perhaps the similarity to a cruise ship is intentional!
reviews.title: Not bad at all!

reviews.text: Built recently (the old sofitel closed). Very modern but sterile airport hotel, literally 1 minute walk from the terminal building. Very convenient, good runway views (no noise problems), spacious rooms, modern decoration. Restaurant and bar are 'landscape' style in the lobby, not so 'cosy'. Young personnel with little experience. Flights are listed on screens in lobby. Wifi only in lobby, only per 30 minutes slice and against payment. NO airmiles at this hotel (eventhough personnel sometimes claim they participate, they don't, this hotel is an exception).
reviews.title: Modern stylish and very convenient airport hotel with runway views.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have traveled a lot for business purposes, and have high expectations for "business" hotels. We we arrived both my room and my parents room only had one towel, and one coffee cup. Not too big of a deal, so we asked the front desk when we left to tour, and they said they would bring them up. When we returned that evening there were still no more towels in the room and we had to call and ask again.
reviews.title: Could be much better.

reviews.text: Our air conditioner in the room was not functioning properly and the room stayed very warm.
reviews.title: Nice building shame about the staff

reviews.text: I was highly disappointed to see that the only free internet was in the lobby and you could only log on for 30 minutes at a slow speed.
reviews.title: Doesn't get handier to the airport than this

reviews.text: The front desk staff was actually very pleasant, but in general this was not one of the better hotels I have been in.
reviews.title: Overpriced, poor facilities
